summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ForgeVoice Studio Overview dashboard page with detailed validation of all required features including login flows, KPI cards, production pipeline, quick actions, and data tables.

design_issues.issue: Two KPI cards (Published 30d, Est ROI 30d) had selector timeout issues during automated testing, though cards are visually present and functional

passed_tests: Backend API - All 27 endpoints working (100% success rate)
Welcome header shows correct client name 'Alex Chen Media'
KPI Cards - Active Projects (9) and Total Assets (8) display correctly with dollar ROI ($54,314.6)
Production Pipeline - All 5 columns present (INTAKE, EDITING, DESIGN, SCHEDULED, PUBLISHED)
Pipeline Cards - 10 total cards found (2 per status column as expected)
Pipeline Move functionality - hover reveals move button, dropdown shows 4 move options, move actions work
Upcoming Schedule - shows 2 scheduled items with proper status badges
Quick Actions - All 3 buttons navigate to correct routes (/dashboard/submissions, /dashboard/strategy, /dashboard/video-lab)
Recent Activity - shows activity entries with colored status dots and timestamps
Episodes & Deliverables table - shows 10 rows with all required columns (Title, Type, Status, Priority, Release)
Status badge colors - properly implemented (INTAKE=amber, EDITING=blue, DESIGN=violet, SCHEDULED=teal, PUBLISHED=green)
Admin overview - shows aggregate data from all clients
Client data scoping - client users see only their own data
Logout functionality - successfully logs out and redirects to login
